amendment.description: Amendment requires a report to Congress by the Director of Central Intelligence describing the effects of espionage against the United States on trade secrets, patents, and technology development and containing an analysis of these effects on the trade deficit and unemployment rate in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require a report from the Director of Central Intelligence describing the effects of espionage against the United States on trade secrets, patents, and technology development and an analysis of these effects on the trade deficit and unemployment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
